ValidationRule.description: Location is required when Delivery type is Face to Face.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Program', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Program_Without_Pathway' ), ISPICKVAL( Product_Request__r.Product_Request_Status__c , 'Design' ), OR( ISBLANK( Location__c ) && (ISPICKVAL( Delivery_Type__c , 'Face to Face' ) || ISPICKVAL( Delivery_Type__c , 'Blended' )), ISBLANK( Location__c ) && ISPICKVAL( Program_Delivery_Structure__c, 'Flexible Program' ) ), Mark_Design_Stage_as_Complete__c = true )
